name: Lewis Evans
story: Edward Evans came from a military family and has always dreamed of serving his country. He excelled in his training, earning a reputation as a skilled marksman and a brave soldier. He has volunteered for several dangerous missions and has always come out on top. However, he struggles with loneliness and feels like he is missing out on a normal life, including having a family of his own. Despite this, he remains committed to his duty and will do anything to protect his fellow soldiers.
